data: "This is our local mosque. We use to go there many times a week. My parents took me there already as a child, and I learned quite a few good life lessons here."
"Our council is hosted in a beautiful house with rich decoration and large arcs at the entrance. I remember listening to the busy noise of the street while sitting in the waiting room."
"The park has always been a spot for the village to come together. I often played football with a friend here when it was less busy."
"My mum often sent me to the market to bring food home for lunch or dinner. I always enjoy the busy atmosphere here, merchants praising their goods and people engaging in chatter."
"I kissed my first girlfriend in this park. In summer, we sit at the pool, the feet inside, chatting for hours."
"This is my best friend’s home. From the rooftop, you could enjoy the view over this beautiful town."
"This is my family home. It’s 8 parties in this house, 4 on each floor. It’s a very small place, but I remember my childhood here fondly."
"A really nice restaurant. So good that we actually celebrated my sister’s wedding here. It was a really wonderful night with the whole family."
